name: MEDHOST
responsibilities: Developing a single page clinical application using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript. Work with experience and visual designers to implement user interfaces. Creating and maintaining UI components for use by other developers. Work with architects to establish best practices, and review and suggest libraries for front end development.

name: Freelance Work
